title: Is existential nihilism considered edgy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well…kind of. I mean, there are a lot of edgelords out there that spout a nonsensical bullshit about how senseless everything is and that nothing is true and everything is permitted and…well, you know the type. They are basically conforming to the strawman version of nihilism. Which is a) not helpful for the rest of us and b) absolutely, hilariously, ironic.

Not in and of itself. If the majority subscribe to a way of thinking I don’t think it can be considered edgy on its own. I’d say it depends on how far people take it. (Also I question the value in being “edgy” when it’s not honest and it’s just for the sake of being edgy)
